sentences.en: A hand wheel placed centrally below the roll U - frame adjusts the Nip - Gap.
sentences.cn: 型结构下的手轮用来调整间隙.

sentences.en: Began centrally company Kunming to divide agency work 1944.
sentences.cn: 1944年开始在中心社昆明分社工作.

sentences.en: Caravel allows admins to centrally maintain thousands of sites off one code - base.
sentences.cn: 设计成允许非技术人员也能够维护网站内容.

sentences.en: Centrally located overlooking a park with free parking.
sentences.cn: 市区中心,紧靠公园,免费停车.

sentences.en: Centrally located with the water piping system.
sentences.cn: 放置在水管道系统的中心位置.

sentences.en: Corporate Intranets hold information centrally in a Web server.
sentences.cn: 公司内部网在一台Web服务器上集中保存信息.

sentences.en: Cross - head : A sub - heading ranged centrally over a column.
sentences.cn: 通栏标题: 放在一栏中间的小标题.

sentences.en: Double Decker buses depart every 30 minutes from seven centrally - located stops.
sentences.cn: 每隔半小时,双层巴士就从中心地带的7个站点分别发一趟车.

sentences.en: He secured the light fitting centrally in the wall.
In her memoirs Naomi is quick to acknowledge that her grandmother was centrally important in her venture as a writer.
sentences.cn: 娜奥米在她的回忆录里开篇就承认，在她尝试创作的过程中，她的祖母起了非常重要的作用。

sentences.en: Store this document centrally , enabling members to keep their copies synchronized.
sentences.cn: 集中存储此文档, 使各成员的副本保持同步.
这套房间是集中供暖的.

sentences.en: To administer centrally the law popularization and education in the customs institutions.
sentences.cn: 归口管理海关系统的普法教育.

sentences.en: You can manage all of your remote access servers centrally.
sentences.cn: 您可以集中管理所有的远程访问服务器.
